body: Can you please translate this in English Plzzzzzzzz
Ok i was wrong when i said Sayo will always be bottom, Rinko and Aya are the true bottoms of the franchise, but i think i read somewhere about Aya topping Chisato and Chisato being a power bottom
That was a long wait but worth it. It was longer than any SayoHina doujins before I got to see the full version of it.
